name: THE ONE DEMO
description:
YOU CAN'T REACH SCORE > 350 YOU CANT REACH BOSS BECAUSE ITS HARD Gameplay:
  • can you reach to the boss (score> 340)
  • Send me video of fight with the boss i will review it!!
  • USE MED KIT TO + HEALTH
  • DROP COIN WHEN ENEMYS DIE(COLLECT COIN FOR +5 THE SCORE
  • HIGHER THE SCORE AND CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
DIFFERENT ABILITIES:
  • three abilities with differ power
  • TIME (SLOW THE TIME)
  • DASH (DAS-------H)
  • THROW(THROW THE SWORD ONE KILL ENEMIES)
DIFFERENT GAME MODES:
  • In career you will find boss (that is in development)
  • In endless its endless(completed)
IN CAREER MODE:
  • you will fight boss when score in roughly at 350 
  • every ablity will unlock when you earn score
IN ENDLESS MODE:
  • no boss
  • Chill (endless enemy spawn)
DIFFERNET ENEMIES:
  • Three different enemies
  • Swordman attack with sword
  • Slime
  • Archer
CHANGE GAME VIEW:
  • IN FIRST PERSON VIEW
  • IN THIRD PERSON VIEW
POINTS;
  • the boss in is development so it will only attack but we cant attack him back
  • fall in to the void makes game crashed so ReOpen the game to Enjoy
  • When getting killed by other enemies a lose dialog bar will appear but it will not work ReOpen to Restart(in development)
  • Powered by ItsMagic Game Engine
  • Its is inspired from the famous 2d game "only one"
  • Animations are getted from Mixamo.com
